item.description:
My cell if needed - 203-415-4827 Cathy

 

Artwalk

 Friday Evening Kick-Off Events!    

 Lets start at Kehler Liddell

FREE!

Openings, Special Events & Live Entertainment throughout Westville Village

Artist Reception & Live Music at Kehler Liddell Gallery - "Here and There: Photographs by Matt Garrett and Paintings by Gigi Horr Liverant". From 5-7pm, indulge in the sweet melodies of Fred Rossomando on the piano.  A percentage of all artwork sold to benefit the non-profit organization Horns for Kids. 873 Whalley Ave.

5:00 - 9:00pm  Wine Tasting at Westville Wines - Wine expert Elliot Brause offers up Sparkling Wines, 837 Whalley Ave. 

6:00 - 9:00pm Agolaccio: a gallery & Yarn Grand Opening Celebration! Meet the artists and enjoy a champagne toast. 910 Whalley Ave. 

Consignment Corner Open House & Live Music - Consignment Corner welcomes singer/guitarist Carole Urban for an evening of live music. 16 Fountain St. 

Opening Reception at DaSilva Gallery - Paintings by Jacob Pongratz, 897 Whalley Ave.

Open House at Jennifer Jane Gallery -  Featuring - 8 Eyes photographs by four extraordinary painters, 838 Whalley Ave. (entrance on West Rock Ave.) 

Neville's Fashion Design Studio - Reception & Open Studio, 922 Whalley Ave.

Rodrick Gilchrist Design Fashion Event - Rodrick will be displaying his men's line with live mannequins. Sweets and champagne will be served. 911 Whalley Ave.

Wunderlee Arts Open House - Featuring the exhibition: Paintings, Prints, & Photographs: Don Wunderlee, Oi Fortin, and Catherine Fisher", 924 Whalley Ave.

 

LETS END THE NIGHT HERE!!!!  This has always been a great way to end the evening....

 -->9:00 - 10:00pm  "People, Places, Music" at Lyric Hall Antiques & Conservation: Maggie Barkin, Warren Gohsler & Jeremy Hutchins & Friends ($10:00 donation welcome); DJ & Dancing follows (11:00pm). 827 Whalley Ave.<--

 

MORE EVENTS: 

1:00 - 7:00pm  Mothers Day Special at Authentic Beauty & Body - Mothers Day Special: Body massage, facial, mani-pedi; call 203-387-7303 for an appointment. 902 Whalley Ave.  

5:00 - 7:00pm  Unkle Shoe Live at Wintergreen of Westville - The Wintergreen apartments kick-off ArtWalk with local rockers Unkle Shoe, plus refreshments on the patio! 400 Blake St.

5:00 - 8:00pm    Ribbon Cutting & Reception: The Annex at the Austin Street Inn. Celebrate the opening of KLG's new off-site exhibition space and tour Westville's newest B&B.  The exhibition features  5 Benefit Prints by Silvano Lora, Carlos Sangiovani, Asdrubal Dominguez, Manuel Almonte, and Miguel Trelles. 100% of proceeds to benefit The Kaziyadu Project, supported by Columbia Action CT and Amnesty International. 9 Austin St.    

Pure Platinum Hair Studio Open House - With light refreshments. 845 Whalley Ave.  

6:00 - 10:00pm  PuRpLE MouNTaiN Live at Westside Bar & Grille - Groovin' originals and covers with a unique rhythmic pulse and sound and roots deep into the Grateful Dead, Bob Dylan, and the Rolling Stones. 883 Whalley Ave. 

ALL EVENING  Odeon Boutique - Windows on the World of Fashion: 1960 - 2010: If Clothes Could Talk, accompanied by music from the different decades. 918 Whalley Ave.

Bay Quilts Open House - Check out artist/owner's Bonnie Bayuk's custom memory quilts and wall hangings. 910 Whalley Ave.   

 Soho Hair Group & Day Spa -  "Special Effects" featuring live hair models as Window Dressing. 916 Whalley Ave. 

 

Parking:

In addition to street parking, there is a large lot behind Kehler Lidell. You can enter that lot area between 883 Whalley and 899, where you see signs for Westside Bar and Grill and Westville Frame/DeSilva Gallery (behind Westside Bar and Grill), after you enter the lot is to your right. Also more parking at the light of Whalley and Blake Street intersection, if you turn onto Blake street there is a lot just as you turn on your left.
item.how_to_find_us: MEET IN THE LOBBY AT KEHLER LIDDELL, WILL WEAR THE BW SCARF WITH PIANO KEYS
item.name: ARTWALK
